title: Budget cuts
brief_description: Produced by Oxo, in association with the National Federation of Meat Traders Association, this is a demonstration of cooking, and the attractive arrangement of low-cost dishes. A butcher explains and shows various cuts of meat; emphasizes the value of cheaper cuts and how they can be used to advantage. No other credits available.
